data.text: Set the trumpet to thy mouth.
Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.
Israel hath cast off the thing that is good:
They have set up kings, but not by me:
Thy calf, O Samaria, hath cast thee off;
For from Israel was it also:
For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind:
For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself:
Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them,
Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin,
I have written to him the great things of my law,
They sacrifice flesh for the sacrifices of mine offerings, and eat it;
For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples;
